Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the HEK293T cell line.

Readout description.Result Description: The protein expression level for the variant was found to be reduced by approximately 60% compared to wild-type.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent biological replicates were performed.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type TP53 cDNA served as the positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA followed by Dunnett's test was used for multiple comparisons.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression level equal to or greater than 90% of wild-type.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression level less than 70% of wild-type.
